snippet.title: Duck Detective: The Secret Salami - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Duck Detective: The Secret Salami is OUT NOW on Steam, GOG, Nintendo Switch & Xbox!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2637990/Duck_Detective_The_Secret_Salami/
GOG: https://www.gog.com/en/game/duck_detective_the_secret_salami
Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/duck-detective-the-secret-salami-switch/
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/store/duck-detective-the-secret-salami/9nxm59f1jkfd

Solving crime is no walk in the pond. You are a down-on-his-luck detective who also happens to be a duck. Use your powers of de-duck-tion to inspect evidence, fill in the blanks, and bust the case wide open, in a narrative mystery adventure where nothing is quite as it seems.

#duckdetective #gaming #indiegame #wholesomegames #xbox #nintendoswitch
